Layer.OnCommand: %function(self) local JUVMProfile = PROFILEMAN:GetMachineProfile():GetSaved() if JUVMProfile.JUVMDailyBG == true or not JUVMProfile.JUVMDailyBG then self:hidden(0) else self:hidden(1) end end

Zctor.ChangeBackgroundCommand: %function(self) local JUVMProfile = PROFILEMAN:GetMachineProfile():GetSaved() if JUVMProfile.JUVMShowSongBackgroundSM then SongBGLoad(self) else self:hidden(1) end end
